pullrequest.title: Search for Boost components in gazebo-config.cmake (#1692)

content.raw: That was probably because I was not able to find an official cmake module including the `Find(Boost)` command (suspicious), but if we are including the rest of gazebo dependencies on the cmake module, but I can not find now a reason why not to include boost.
content.html: That was probably because I was not able to find an official cmake module including the Find(Boost) command (suspicious), but if we are including the rest of gazebo dependencies on the cmake module, but I can not find now a reason why not to include boost.
